assetProfile.address2: Sixth Floor No. 283/3 & 283/4 Rajiv Gandhi Salai (OMR),Kandanchavadi
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Expleo Solutions Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily provides software validation and verification services worldwide. The company offers consultancy services, such as business agility, digital business, and transformation delivery; engineering services, including design, production, and in-service support; quality engineering, testing, and management services; and training services. It serves aeronautics, automotive, banking and financial services, energy and utilities, gaming, industrial, public sector, telecoms and media, space and defense, insurance, rail transportation, healthcare and pharmaceutical, naval, and retail and logistics industries. The company was formerly known as SQS India BFSI Limited and changed its name to Expleo Solutions Limited in April 2019. Expleo Solutions Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Chennai, India. SQS India BFSI Limited is a subsidiary of Expleo Technology Germany GmbH.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. P.  Srinath
companyOfficers.title: Director of Enterprise Risk Management & BR Head
